name: Ifora and Rhorbud!
description:
Join the blonde witch Ifora and her best rocky friend Rhorbud! With their power combined it's pretty easy to smash down an unending army of skeletons!

Controls
  • A-Move Left
  • D-Move Right
  • Space-Jump
  • Left Click-Shoot
How to Play

Rhorbud can't shoot magical bullets without Ifora.

  (Also you can jump on to these skeletons to kill them)

Much Thanks to My Team!
  • Alp INANGU-Programmer
  • Can KORKMAZ-Programmer, Game Designer
  • Kaan DONMEZ-Visual Artist

Thanks for the playing! :)

(Please consider that we made this game under 15 hours.)
